headline: 'Big Short' investor Michael Burry on why he's short-selling Nvidia stock
summary: Burry is stitching together familiar red flags — circular money loops, stretched depreciation — and he doesn’t like the shape they make around Nvidia

headline: Nvidia name-checks Michael Burry in secret memo pushing back on AI bubble allegations
summary: The chipmaker quietly circulated a private memo to analysts that explicitly name-checked investor Michael Burry and pushed back on many of his claims.
